mapper.select: select t1.bidPrice,t3.id,t3.nickName,t3.headImgUrl,t3.label,t3.job,t3.age,t3.signature,t3.interest,t3.starSign, t4.gradeName ggradeName,count(t2.goddessId) AS fans from ddw_goddess t1 left join ddw_my_attention t2 on t1.userId=t2.goddessId and t1.storeId = #{storeId} LEFT join ddw_userinfo t3 on t1.userId = t3.id left join ddw_goddess_grade t4 on t4.id=t3.goddessGradeId group by t2.goddessId order by count(t2.goddessId) desc limit #{start},#{end}
